goals__remit: ENA is a network of a number of associations from the nursery stock sector all over Europe.  ENA represents at an international level the common interests of growers and traders of hardy nursery stock products, including perennials. ENA also tries to be a platform for exchanging knowledge between members. This purpose is among other things, carried out by means of meetings, publications, contacts with national, EU and international organizations and authorities, the encouragement of professional training, scientific developments and research, promotional activities and international documentation, publicity and exhibitions.
relevant_communication: 'Green Cities for a sustainable Europe' promotion project 2018-2020
